subject.normal: [grails-user] Presentation Slides or Content Ideas for Intro to Groovy and Grails talk

headers.subject: [grails-user] Presentation Slides or Content Ideas for Intro to Groovy and Grails talk

body.para: I am set to make a one hour talk to our local JUG next week about an introduction to both Groovy and Grails. I was already able to do a Groovy presentation previously, and it took me more than an hour to finish. So a one hour limit for both technologies would mean a huge limit to the topics I could only tackle.

I would like to ask for advice on what to include. Or better, if someone already did something like it, would be kind enough to share their slides, or at least the bullet points of what they've done. The last thing I want is to screw it up, especially in front of discerning Java gurus, which could be potential converts ;)
